name: F.R.I.E.N.D (rigel91)
description:
F.R.I.E.N.D is a top down 2D game for the Global Game Jam 2021 where the theme was Lost and Found.

Play as F.R.I.E.N.D, Frisky Rescuer of Inventory Escaping Necessary Delivery, and help lost packages get back to their rightful owners! Locate the packages described in the top left corner, and bring enough to the table to pass each level! Only the most organized rescuers can truly find the correct packages in time!

CREDITS

  • Daniel Alcala - Programmer, Audio
  • Erol Boyar - Programmer
  • Adrienne Caparaz - Artist, Font Design
  • Rigel Kuper - Programmer
  • Lawrence Song

Original Itch: https://eob3000.itch.io/friend
